tossup_question: -  4)  – 	Which of the following acids is stronger than hydrofluoric acid?
tossup_MCQoptions:
W) Iodic acid
X) Formic acid
Y) Acetic acid
Z) Hypochlorous acid
bonus_question: -   –  Which of the following statements is NOT true regarding alkaline earth metals?
bonus_MCQoptions:
W) Calcium burns brick-red in a flame test
X) Magnesium has no naturally occurring radioisotopes
Y) Radium is found in all uranium-bearing ores
Z) Radium has 3 stable isotopes
bonus_answer: ANSWER: Z) RADIUM HAS 3 STABLE ISOTOPES
